metadata.Title: CVE-2021-38561 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
golang.org/x/text/language in golang.org/x/text before 0.3.7 can panic with an out-of-bounds read during BCP 47 language tag parsing. Index calculation is mishandled. If parsing untrusted user input, this can be used as a vector for a denial-of-service attack.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-38561` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

golang-golang-x-text-dev - 0.3.2-4ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: golang-golang-x-text package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.3.2-4ubuntu0.1').
golang-x-text: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'transitional package').
